Class Line

java.lang.Object
  Tools

 class Line
extends Tools

This class creates a single java.awt.Graphics line.

Author:
Jeffrey Scott

Constructor Detail

Line

public Line(int beginX,
            int beginY,
            int endX,
            int endY)
The constructor for the line that takes the endpoints as parameters.

Parameters:
beginX - The x value of the first endpoint.
beginY - The y value of the first endpoint.
endX - The x value of the second endpoint.
endY - The y value of the second endpoint.
